item.title: 三菱日联金融集团考虑推出与25亿美元贷款挂钩的保险公司友好型SRT
item.description: 据知情人士透露，三菱UFJ金融集团正考虑推出一项旨在吸引保险公司的重大风险转移计划。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is considering issuing a significant risk transfer that’s designed to appeal to insurance companies, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行研究发现"价格级联效应"可能引发通胀浪潮
item.description: 欧洲央行研究表明，若价格冲击波及紧密关联的企业网络，即使冲击本身相对有限，也可能引发大规模通胀事件。【原文：A relatively contained price shock can trigger a massive inflationary episode if it hits a closely connected network of firms, according to research by the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团与巴西航空工业公司达成协议，将在印度建造飞机
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆·阿达尼的集团与巴西航空工业公司宣布建立合作伙伴关系，将在印度建造飞机，这将成为该国首个民用航空制造基地。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate and Brazil’s Embraer SA announced a partnership to build aircraft in India in what would be the country’s first manufacturing facility in civil aviation.】

item.title: 印度石油公司将在未来两年内增加从巴西进口原油
item.description: 印度石油公司（Indian Oil Corp.）是该国最大的炼油企业，该公司一位要求匿名的管理人员透露，为继续实现供应多元化，今年和明年将采购至少2400万桶巴西原油。【原文：Indian Oil Corp., the country’s largest refiner, will buy at least 24 million barrels of Brazilian crude this year and next as it continues to diversify supplies, according to an executive at the state-owned firm who asked not to be identified.】

item.title: 德国通过银行测试市场对新20年期债券的需求
item.description: 德国首次通过银行发售20年期债券，此举旨在测试投资者对该债券类别的兴趣——该类别在美国市场曾遭遇褒贬不一的反应。【原文：Germany is selling 20-year bonds through banks for the first time ever, a test of investor appetite for a sector that has suffered a mixed reception in the US.】

item.title: 沙特与阿联酋紧张关系令中东企业如坐针毡
item.description: 中东企业正以日益紧张的心情关注沙特阿拉伯与阿联酋之间的紧张局势，担忧这可能影响商业活动——尤其在两国正崛起为区域贸易与金融强国之际。【原文：Middle East businesses are watching tensions between Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates with increasing nervousness, concerned it could impact commerce at a time when both nations are emerging as powerhouses of regional trade and finance.】

item.title: 奢侈品投资者在股市抛售后关注艰难财报季
item.description: 若股价能说明问题的话，投资者正为奢侈品制造商即将到来的艰难财报季做好准备。【原文：If stock prices are any indication, investors are bracing for a rough earnings season for luxury-goods makers.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔看好建筑领域"物理人工智能"应用市场前景
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司表示，人工智能正通过提升从机场到医院等各类建筑的效率和生产力，对物理世界产生影响。【原文：Artificial intelligence is impacting the physical world as it’s being used to enhance efficiency and productivity in buildings from airports to hospitals, according to Honeywell International Inc.】

item.title: 巴林海湾航空与星链签署互联网接入协议
item.description: 海湾航空与SpaceX旗下Starlink公司签署协议，将在巴林国家航空公司航班上部署机载Wi-Fi服务，这标志着埃隆·马斯克的公司在中东航空公司网络连接竞争中再下一城。【原文：Gulf Air signed an agreement with SpaceX’s Starlink to deploy onboard Wi-Fi on Bahrain’s national carrier, giving Elon Musk’s company another win in the competition for connectivity among Middle East carriers.】

item.title: 日本40年期国债发售将考验脆弱债市与疲软日元
item.description: 投资者正警惕日本债券市场周三可能再度崩盘的风险，届时政府将发售40年期国债——这种期限的债券已被证明容易受到剧烈波动的影响。【原文：Investors are on guard for the risk of another meltdown in Japan’s bond market on Wednesday when the government sells 40-year notes, a tenor that has proved vulnerable to sharp swings.】

item.title: 安比恩塔为欧洲可持续贷款筹集逾5亿欧元
item.description: 投资公司安贝塔资产管理公司（Ambiente SGR）为其首只私募信贷基金筹集了逾5亿欧元（约合5.94亿美元），该基金将向欧洲具有环境可持续性的中型企业提供贷款。尽管绿色金融在政治议程中的优先级有所下降，但此举仍表明投资者对此类投资存在需求。【原文：Investment firm Ambienta SGR has raised over €500 million ($594 million) for its inaugural private credit fund to lend to environmentally sustainable mid-market companies in Europe, a sign of investor demand even as green finance has fallen lower on the political agenda.】

item.title: 软银支持的分析公司Patsnap考虑在香港和新加坡双重上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，知识产权数据提供商Patsnap正考虑在香港和新加坡进行双重上市。【原文：Patsnap, an intellectual-property data provider, is mulling a dual listing in Hong Kong and Singapore, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚Invictus股价暴跌，因卡塔尔交易告吹
item.description: 澳大利亚油气勘探企业英维克能源有限公司股价暴跌逾半，此前该公司未能就去年宣布与卡塔尔投资公司达成的交易条款达成协议。【原文：Australian oil and gas explorer Invictus Energy Ltd.’s shares plunged more than half after it failed to reach an agreement on the terms of a deal announced last year with a Qatari investment firm.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望上涨，英镑维持在1.37美元附近
中国矿企加速融资，全球并购交易临近
item.description: 新年伊始，中国矿企已公布融资计划，拟筹集资金额接近2025年全年融资总额的三分之一。金属价格飙升凸显了提升产能的紧迫性。【原文：Barely a month into the new year, Chinese miners have already unveiled plans that would allow them to raise almost a third of the funds they secured during the whole of 2025, as soaring metals prices underline the urgency of boosting production capacity.】

item.title: 日本高市早苗阐述应对台湾危机的可能方案
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗表示，虽然假设性的中美冲突不会立即意味着日本将采取军事行动，但若美日联合行动期间美国遭到袭击，日本将在法律允许范围内作出回应。【原文：Japan’s Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said that while a hypothetical US-China clash wouldn’t immediately mean Japan will take military action, Japan will respond within legal limits should the US be attacked during a joint operation.】

item.title: 斯巴鲁将以高于市场价格回购价值高达1.94亿美元的债券
item.description: 斯巴鲁公司表示，计划回购约300亿日元（1.94亿美元）的流通公司债券以削减债务。【原文：Subaru Corp. plans to buy back as much as roughly ¥30 billion ($194 million) of outstanding corporate bonds to reduce its debt, the company said.】

item.title: 恒大地产称本月有望收到具有约束力的收购要约
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国恒大集团的清算人预计最早将于本月底收到买家对该公司香港上市物业管理子公司的约束性收购要约。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande Group are expected to receive binding offers from buyers for the firm’s Hong Kong-listed property management unit as soon as the end of this month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高盛、摩根士丹利南非通胀预测削弱央行公信力
item.description: 高盛集团和摩根士丹利认为，南非储备银行有下调2026年通胀预期的空间，因政策制定者正为本周晚些时候今年首次利率决议做准备。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Morgan Stanley see room for the South African Reserve Bank to lower its inflation forecast for 2026, as policymakers prepare for their first interest-rate decision of the year later this week.】

item.title: 银价上涨由广泛需求和投机推动：精炼商
item.description: 据一家领先的精炼商和贸易商称，白银创纪录的涨势是由实物需求激增与投机兴趣在相对流动性不足的市场中碰撞所驱动的。【原文：Silver’s record-breaking rally is being driven by a collision of unprecedented physical demand and speculative interest in a relatively illiquid market, according to a leading refiner and trader.】

item.title: 埃利奥特重申反对丰田收购核心部门的提议，力推独立运营方案
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司再次呼吁投资者拒绝丰田集团收购其核心部门的要约，认为本月提高的报价仍"严重低估"了该公司的价值，并表示其独立运营能创造更高价值。【原文：Elliott Investment Management repeated its call for investors to reject the Toyota group’s bid to buy out a key unit, arguing this month’s sweetened offer still “substantially undervalues” the company and that it can achieve greater value on its own.】

item.title: SK海力士股价因微软供应协议传闻逼近历史高点
item.description: SK海力士股价大涨，有望创下历史最高收盘价。此前当地媒体报道称，该公司是微软新型人工智能芯片的高端内存唯一供应商。【原文：SK Hynix Inc. shares jumped, headed for an all-time high closing level, after local media said the company is the sole supplier of advanced memory for Microsoft Corp.’s new artificial intelligence chip.】

item.title: 日本不必引发国际危机
item.description:
货币并非风险的唯一根源。

【原文：

The currency isn’t the sole cause of risks.

】

item.title: 研究发现：中国在非洲的角色正从资金提供者转向债务催收者
item.description: 最新研究显示，中国已从非洲的主要资金来源转变为债务催收者，过去十年间这一转变涉及约520亿美元资金流动。【原文：China has shifted from being a major source of funding for Africa to a debt collector, a swing of about $52 billion over the past decade, according to new research.】

item.title: 泰国财政部将2025年经济增长预期下调至2.2%
item.description: 泰国财政部表示，随着出口和国内需求放缓，2026年泰国经济增速将降至三年来的最低水平。【原文：Thailand’s economy is poised to expand at its slowest pace in three years in 2026 as exports and domestic demand moderate, according to the Finance Ministry.】

item.title: 安德森·霍洛维茨基金早期投资瑞典人工智能初创企业Dentio
item.description: 安德森·霍洛维茨领投了瑞典初创企业Dentio AB的种子前轮融资。该公司开发了一款基于人工智能的牙科软件平台。【原文：Andreessen Horowitz has led a pre-seed funding round for Dentio AB, a Swedish startup that has developed a dental software platform underpinned by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 匈牙利因通胀疑虑推迟降息：决策指南
item.description: 匈牙利很可能维持关键利率不变，因为政策制定者正寻求启动货币宽松政策，同时需要确认通胀放缓趋势能够持续。【原文：Hungary will probably keep its key interest rate unchanged as policymakers looking to start monetary easing seek evidence that slowing inflation can be sustained.】

item.title: 汇丰称马来西亚、墨西哥最易受日本资产配置调整冲击
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司表示，若日本收益率进一步上升促使该国投资者将资金汇回国内，马来西亚和墨西哥的债券市场将面临最大风险。【原文：Bond markets in Malaysia and Mexico are among the most at risk should a further increase in Japanese yields prompt the nation’s investors to repatriate capital, according to HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 中国登月计划在DeepSeek发布前揭晓新型人工智能模型
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司旗下的Moonshot AI公司发布了其旗舰模型的升级版，在中国本土人工智能领域掀起新一轮军备竞赛，此举正值备受瞩目的DeepSeek公司即将推出其产品之际。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.-backed Moonshot AI released an upgrade of its flagship model, heating up a domestic arms race ahead of an expected rollout by Chinese sensation DeepSeek.】

item.title: 法国议员投票通过禁止15岁以下青少年使用社交媒体
item.description: 法国议员通过一项法案，禁止15岁以下儿童使用社交媒体。继澳大利亚去年通过具有里程碑意义的立法后，法国成为最新一个推动制定规则以保护未成年人免受有害内容侵害的国家。【原文：French lawmakers passed a bill banning children aged under 15 from accessing social media, the latest government to push forward rules to shield minors from toxic content following the passage of Australia’s landmark legislation last year.】
